channel.title: Rep+ need help making items tradable!
channel.description:
basically i know the code belongs in itemConstants.java
If (item.getDefinitions().isDestroyitem() || item.getDefinitions().isLended() || ItemConstants.getItemDefaultCharges(item.getId()) != -1)
what do i change/edit to make an item/multiple items tradable!
